title: Nano-rods in Ni-rich layered cathodes for practical batteries
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS01110K, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Geon-Tae Park, Nam-Yung Park, Hoon-Hee Ryu, H. Hohyun Sun, Jang-Yeon Hwang, Yang-Kook Sun
The nano-rod structure is a promising approach for developing high performance cathode materials. This review discusses nano-rod cathodes' origin, physicochemical, and electrochemical properties and their application in next-generation batteries.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
